metadata.title: Forever PTO - Optimize your time off
metadata.description: Application to optimize PTO day selection and maximize your free time
metadata.keywords: pto, pto calendar, pto tracker, pto planner, pto management

allowPastDays.label: Allow past days
allowPastDays.tooltip: This switch allows you to enable or disable the suggestion of past holidays. This lets you see PTO opportunities that were missed in the past

carryOverMonths.label: Carry over months
carryOverMonths.tooltip: Allows adding months to the following year to expand opportunity search
carryOverMonths.featureDescription: Add months to the following year

regions.label: Region
regions.heading: {hasCountry, plural, =0 {Regions} other {Regions in {country}}}
regions.placeholder: {count, plural, =0 {Regions not found for {country}} other {Search region...}}

holidaysTable.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the selected holidays?

confirm.title: Delete holiday
confirm.description: Are you sure you want to delete this holiday? This action cannot be undone.

modal.title: Verify your premium subscription
modal.description: Enter the email you used on Ko-fi to verify your premium subscription.
modal.successDescription: Your premium subscription has been verified successfully. Enjoy all premium features!
modal.successMessage: Your premium subscription has been verified successfully. Enjoy all premium features!

errors.notFound: No premium subscription found with this email. If you have already made a payment, make sure to use the same email you used on Ko-fi.
errors.generic: An error occurred while verifying your subscription. Please try again later.

stats.title: Vacation Optimization

holidaysSummary.title: Holiday Summary
holidaysSummary.noHolidaysFound: No holidays found for this country. Try using the search
holidaysSummary.noCountryHolidays: No holidays found for your country.

effectiveness.title: Effectiveness of your PTO days
effectiveness.summaryStart: You have {ptoDaysAvailable} PTO days available that have been converted into {effectiveDays} free days using our system, which represents an increase of
effectiveness.calculating: You have {ptoDaysAvailable} PTO days available. The system is calculating optimal gaps to maximize your vacation.

stats.noPtoDays: You must set the number of available PTO days so the system can suggest optimal days to maximize your vacation.
